content:
I, #{userName}, hereby pledge to clean my bedroom on #{selected_days} starting from today until #{auto_destruct} between #{time_range}.

Each time, I will make sure to tidy up the bed, clean the floor, organize my stuff, and keep my space fresh and peaceful.

To prove my commitment, I will send a photo of my cleaned room on the days Iâ€™ve committed.
 Also remember the color #{feature1} of my room so i don't fake it. 

If I miss a day, I accept the consequences set in this quest.

This is my promise to myself â€” to keep my space clear, my mind focused, and my vibe positive. ðŸ›ï¸âœ¨

basicQuest.instructions:
Your room is your **base camp**. If it's messy, your brain is cluttered. If itâ€™s clean, you feel clear, in control, and ready to win. So hereâ€™s what youâ€™re doing:

### ðŸ§¹ What to Do:

* **Pick up every item** thatâ€™s on the floor or out of place â€” *nothing belongs on the ground except furniture and your feet*.
* **Make your bed.** Crisp sheets, no wrinkles. Instant mental reset.
* **Clear all surfaces** â€” desk, shelves, bedside. Wipe them down. Dust is the enemy of good energy.
* **Put everything where it belongs.** If it doesnâ€™t have a place, make one or toss it.
* **Open your windows.** Air out the stale thoughts and stagnant vibes.
* **Empty the trash** â€” physical and mental clutter, gone.
* **Vacuum or sweep**. Feel the floor. Own the space.

### âœ… End Goal:

> A clean bedroom with **everything organized**, **everything in its place**, and **nothing in your way**.
> You walk in, and it feels like *clarity*. Like *youâ€™re in charge again*.
basicQuest.title: Clean Bedroom

AiSnap.taskDescription: A clean and tidy bedroom with everything organized
